titleStmt.title: Melismata Musicall phansies. Fitting the court, citie, and countrey humours. To 3, 4, and 5. voyces.
titleStmt.author: Ravenscroft, Thomas, 1592?-1635?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Stansby for Thomas Adams,

notesStmt.note: Identified as part of STC 20756 on UMI microfilm reel 1002.
Reproductions of the originals in the Library of Congress and the British Library.
Appears at reel 904 (Library of Congress copy) and at reel 1002 (British Library copy).
